Package at.fhhagenberg.sqelevator

Class Elevator

java.lang.Object
at.fhhagenberg.sqelevator.Elevator
public class Elevator extends Object
Represents an elevator with properties and methods for controlling its behavior.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Elevator.Direction
    Enum defining the directions an elevator can move (UP, DOWN, IDLE).
    static enum 
    Elevator.DoorStatus
    Enum defining the status of the elevator doors (OPEN, CLOSED).
